oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wideband L-shaped printed monopole antenna
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, KP
THAKUR, SS
DESHMUKH, RA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: L-shaped printed monopole antenna
Dual-polarization
Polarization diversity
Wide bandwidth
Dual linear polarization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A wideband dual-polarized L-shaped printed monopole antenna (LSPMA) is presented. The antenna operates around the center frequency of 4 GHz. This L-shape printed antenna provides wide impedance bandwidth over 4.7 GHz. Experiments have been carried out to validate the simulated results of input impedance and dual polarized radiation patterns. (C) 2012 Elsevier GmbH. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: AEU-INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF ELECTRONICS AND COMMUNICATIONS, 66(8)693-696
